title: Thai for Academic Purposes
description: This module is multi-disciplinary and learner-centred, designed to meet specific needs of the learners in relation to ones’ disciplines and career-oriented activities. It will equip the learners with integrated language skills and intercultural communicative competence which will be appropriately applied to contextualised situations, academics and professions.
prerequisite: LAT4203 Thai in Media or by placement test. Students must not have read a higher level module than this module.
